definition: to press against/to support/to prop up/to resist/to equal/to balance/to make up for/to mortgage/to arrive at/to clap (one's hands) lightly (expressing delight) (Taiwan pr. [zhi3] for this sense)

sentences.english: Those markers include inflammation, insulin resistance and oxygen free radicals.
sentences.chinese: 那些指標包括炎症，胰島素抵抗力和氧自由基。

sentences.english: But as time passed, resistance forces grew stronger.
sentences.chinese: 但隨着時間的推移，抵抗力量逐漸壯大。

sentences.english: Diabetes can reduce the body’s resistance to infection.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病會降低人對感染的抵抗力。

sentences.english: The reduction in white blood-cell counts lowers resistance to disease.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞計數減少會降低對疾病的抵抗力。

sentences.english: The erysipelas organism is quite resistant to salting, pickling, and smoking.
sentences.chinese: 豬丹毒桿菌對鹽醃，酸浸，煙燻很有抵抗力。

sentences.english: There is no fresh air or sunlight to bolster their natural powers of resistance.
sentences.chinese: 沒有新鮮空氣或溫暖陽光加強它們自然的抵抗力。

sentences.english: I have a really soft spot for blondes. I find myself attracted to blonde women the most.
sentences.chinese: 我對金髮美女毫無抵抗力，就是喜歡金髮的女人。

sentences.english: Chad blames Khartoum for backing the rebel Union of Resistance Forces.
sentences.chinese: 乍得指責喀土穆支持叛軍抵抗力量聯盟。

sentences.english: The Resilience to Extreme Events within Infrustructure Systems.
sentences.chinese: 基礎設施在極端事件下的抵抗力。

sentences.english: Anti-rejection drugs, it turned out, also weakened the body´s resistance to any disease-carrying germs which came its way…
sentences.chinese: 服用抗排斥異體藥物會削弱人體對入侵病菌的抵抗力。

sentences.english: Bartonella spp. is highly resistant to freezing and freeze-thaw cycles.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾通體菌株對冷凍和反覆凍融有很強的抵抗力。

sentences.english: The innate resistance thought to be related to the activity of macrophages .
sentences.chinese: 先天性抵抗力被認爲與巨噬細胞的活性有關。

sentences.english: The new resistanttrees will be planted in bristlecone habitat.
sentences.chinese: 新培育的具抵抗力的樹苗就栽種到針毬松生長區。

sentences.english: I have a weakness for British covers.
sentences.chinese: 我對英式封面的書毫無抵抗力。

sentences.english: Resistance forces grouped in the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 抵抗力量在叢林中集結。

sentences.english: When patients resistibility, easy to have acute or subacute onset.
sentences.chinese: 當患者抵抗力差時，易有急性或亞急性發作。

definition: the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
